trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=nameWithType> event is raised by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=nameWithType> é gerado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> é desenhada e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> é o valor da propriedade `true`.

trans-unit.source: The handler for this event receives a parameter of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: O manipulador para este evento recebe um parâmetro do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> class contains all the information needed to paint the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> text, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object on which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> classe contém todas as informações necessárias para pintar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, incluindo o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> texto, o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>e o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> do objeto no qual o desenho deve ser feito.

trans-unit.source: To customize the look of the ToolTip, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> to determine the bounds of the ToolTip, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to perform your customized drawing.
trans-unit.target: Para personalizar a aparência da dica de ferramenta, use o <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> para determinar os limites da dica de ferramenta e o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto para executar o desenho personalizado.

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> event.
trans-unit.target: Você pode aumentar os limites do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> antes de ser mostrada manipulando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> evento.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> also supports partial customization through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> também oferece suporte à personalização parcial por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: Using these methods, you can owner draw portions of the ToolTip while leaving the other portions drawn in the standard way.
trans-unit.target: Usando esses métodos, você pode partes de desenho do proprietário da dica de ferramenta, deixando as outras partes desenhadas da maneira padrão.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como desenhar personalizado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> and associates it to three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls located on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> e associa-o para três <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controles localizados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> property to true and handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> propriedade como true e identificadores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> eventos.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event handler, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is custom drawn differently depending on what button the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is being displayed for as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> manipulador de eventos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> é personalizada desenhada de maneira diferente dependendo de qual botão o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> está sendo exibido para conforme indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> context used to draw the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: O contexto de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para desenhar a Dica de Ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window" /> that the ToolTip is bound to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window" /> ao qual a Dica de Ferramenta está associada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that the ToolTip is being created for.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> para o qual a Dica de Ferramenta está sendo criada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that outlines the area where the ToolTip is to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que indica a área em que a Dica de Ferramenta será exibida.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> containing the text for the ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém o texto da Dica de Ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the ToolTip background.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> da tela de fundo da Dica de Ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> of the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> do texto da Dica de Ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> used to draw the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> usado para desenhar o texto da Dica de Ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor uses the `graphics`, `associatedControl`, `associatedWindow`, `bounds`, `font` and `toolTipText` parameters to initialize their corresponding, similarly named properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtor usa o `graphics`, `associatedControl`, `associatedWindow`, `bounds`, `font` e `toolTipText` parâmetros para inicializar seus correspondente, propriedades nomeadas da mesma forma.

trans-unit.source: The `backColor` and `foreColor` parameters are used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> methods, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O `backColor` e `foreColor` parâmetros são usados pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> métodos, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control for which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o controle para o qual o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> que está associado a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> quando o <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw" /> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: The return value will be <see langword="null" /> if the ToolTip is not associated with a control.
trans-unit.target: O valor de retorno será <see langword="null" /> se a dica de ferramenta não está associada um controle.

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> can be associated with multiple controls through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A> property can be used to determine which control the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Porque o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> pode ser associado a vários controles por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A> propriedade pode ser usada para determinar o que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> evento está associado.

trans-unit.source: This is helpful if you want to perform different ToolTip customization based on the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Isso é útil se você deseja executar outra personalização de dica de ferramenta com base no controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como desenhar personalizado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> and associates it to three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls located on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> e associa-o para três <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controles localizados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> property to `true` and handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> propriedade `true` e trata o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> evento.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event handler, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is custom drawn differently depending on what button the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is being displayed for as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> manipulador de eventos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> é personalizada desenhada de maneira diferente dependendo de qual botão o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> está sendo exibido para conforme indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example excerpt demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O código a seguir exemplo trecho demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> class overview for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> visão geral da classe para o exemplo de código completo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the window to which this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> is bound.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a janela à qual este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> está associado.

trans-unit.source: The window which owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" />.
trans-unit.target: A janela que possui o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" />.

trans-unit.source: When a window is owned by another window, the owned window is minimized and closed with the owner window.
trans-unit.target: Quando uma janela pertence a outra janela, a janela de propriedade é minimizada e fechada com a janela do proprietário.

trans-unit.source: Owned windows are also never displayed behind their owner form.
trans-unit.target: Propriedade windows nunca são exibidos por trás de sua forma de proprietário.

trans-unit.source: Here the ToolTip is owned by the native Win32 window represented by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedWindow%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Aqui a dica de ferramenta é de propriedade da janela do Win32 nativo representada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedWindow%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra o uso desse membro.

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: No exemplo, um manipulador de eventos relatórios sobre a ocorrência da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: Este relatório ajuda você a saber quando o evento ocorre e pode ajudá-lo na depuração.

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> named `ToolTip1`.
trans-unit.target: Para executar o código de exemplo, cole-o em um projeto que contém uma instância do tipo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> chamado `ToolTip1`.

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o manipulador de eventos está associado com o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=nameWithType> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the size and location of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tamanho e o local do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> to draw.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa os limites do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: By default, the bounds are set by the operating system based on system settings and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> text.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, os limites são definidos pelo sistema operacional com base nas configurações do sistema e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> texto.

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup><xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class.
trans-unit.target: Você pode aumentar os limites do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> antes de ser mostrada manipulando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como desenhar personalizado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> and associates it to three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls located on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> e associa-o para três <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controles localizados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> property to true and handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> propriedade como true e identificadores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> eventos.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event handler, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is custom drawn differently depending on what button the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is being displayed for as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> manipulador de eventos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> é personalizada desenhada de maneira diferente dependendo de qual botão o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> está sendo exibido para conforme indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The code excerpt below demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> method and using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Graphics%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O trecho de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> método e usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Graphics%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> class overview for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> visão geral da classe para o exemplo de código completo.

trans-unit.source: Draws the background of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> using the system background color.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a tela de fundo do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> usando a cor da tela de fundo do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you want to customize certain visual aspects of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, but want a standard ToolTip background drawn for you using the current value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Info%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Use este método quando você deseja personalizar determinados aspectos visuais do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, mas um plano de fundo da dica de ferramenta padrão desenhado usando o valor atual de <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Info%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The background is drawn to fill the area specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O plano de fundo é desenhado para preencher a área especificada pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como desenhar personalizado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> and associates it to three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls located on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> e associa-o para três <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controles localizados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> property to true and handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> propriedade como true e identificadores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> eventos.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event handler, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is custom drawn differently depending on what button the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is being displayed for as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> manipulador de eventos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> é personalizada desenhada de maneira diferente dependendo de qual botão o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> está sendo exibido para conforme indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The code excerpt below demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O trecho de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> class overview for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> visão geral da classe para o exemplo de código completo.

trans-unit.source: Draws the border of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> using the system border color.
trans-unit.target: Desenha a borda do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> usando a cor da borda do sistema.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when you want to customize certain visual aspects of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, but want a standard ToolTip border drawn for you using the current value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowFrame%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Use este método quando você deseja personalizar determinados aspectos visuais de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, mas desejar uma borda de dica de ferramenta padrão desenhada usando o valor atual de <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.WindowFrame%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: The border is drawn to the size specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A borda é desenhada para o tamanho especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> event.
trans-unit.target: Você pode aumentar os limites do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> antes de ser mostrada manipulando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> evento.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como desenhar personalizado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> and associates it to three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls located on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> e associa-o para três <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controles localizados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> property to true and handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> propriedade como true e identificadores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> eventos.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event handler, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is custom drawn differently depending on what button the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is being displayed for as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> manipulador de eventos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> é personalizada desenhada de maneira diferente dependendo de qual botão o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> está sendo exibido para conforme indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The code excerpt below demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O trecho de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> class overview for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> visão geral da classe para o exemplo de código completo.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> using the system text color and font, and optionally using specific formatting options.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> usando a cor e a fonte do texto do sistema, usando opcionalmente as opções de formatação específicas.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> using the system text color and font.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> usando a fonte e cor do texto do sistema.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText> method represents the default method of displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText> método representa o método padrão de exibição de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.

trans-unit.source: This method uses the system specified font and the current value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the font color.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa a fonte especificada do sistema e o valor atual de <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para a cor da fonte.

trans-unit.source: The text is drawn as a single line centered horizontally and vertically within the rectangle specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property; it is equivalent to the following call to the overloaded version of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%28System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>:
trans-unit.target: O texto é desenhado como uma única linha centralizada horizontalmente e verticalmente dentro do retângulo especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> propriedade é equivalente à chamada seguinte para a versão sobrecarregada de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%28System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29>:

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como desenhar personalizado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> and associates it to three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls located on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> e associa-o para três <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controles localizados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> property to true and handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> propriedade como true e identificadores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> eventos.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event handler, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is custom drawn differently depending on what button the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is being displayed for as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> manipulador de eventos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> é personalizada desenhada de maneira diferente dependendo de qual botão o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> está sendo exibido para conforme indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The code excerpt below demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O trecho de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> class overview for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> visão geral da classe para o exemplo de código completo.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> containing a bitwise combination of values that specifies the display and layout for the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.ToolTipText" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags" /> que contém uma combinação bit a bit dos valores que especifica a exibição e o layout para o <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.ToolTipText" />.

trans-unit.source: Draws the text of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> using the system text color and font, and the specified text layout.
trans-unit.target: Desenha o texto do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> usando a cor e a fonte do texto do sistema e o layout de texto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%28System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29> method is used to customize certain visual aspects of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, including the layout of the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%28System.Windows.Forms.TextFormatFlags%29> método é usado para personalizar determinados aspectos visuais de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, incluindo o layout do texto de dica de ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: This method uses the system specified font and the current value of <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the font color.
trans-unit.target: Esse método usa a fonte especificada do sistema e o valor atual de <xref:System.Drawing.SystemColors.InfoText%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> para a cor da fonte.

trans-unit.source: Gets the font used to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a fonte usada para desenhar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Font" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Font%2A> property when you are custom drawing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> that should use the Windows default font.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Font%2A> propriedade quando personalizado desenho uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> que deve usar a fonte padrão do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como desenhar personalizado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> and associates it to three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls located on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> e associa-o para três <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controles localizados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> property to true and handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> propriedade como true e identificadores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> eventos.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event handler, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is custom drawn differently depending on what button the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is being displayed for as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> manipulador de eventos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> é personalizada desenhada de maneira diferente dependendo de qual botão o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> está sendo exibido para conforme indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The code excerpt below demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: O trecho de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> métodos.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> class overview for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> visão geral da classe para o exemplo de código completo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the graphics surface used to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a superfície de elementos gráficos usada para desenhar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> on which to draw the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" />.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> na qual desenhar o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" />.

trans-unit.source: You use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to customize the drawing of certain visual aspects of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: Você usa o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> objeto para personalizar o desenho de determinados aspectos visuais de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can draw your own ToolTip background by using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRectangle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode desenhar seu plano de fundo da dica de ferramenta usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.FillRectangle%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método.

trans-unit.source: Any custom drawing that is done outside of the rectangle specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> property will not show up.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer personalizada de desenho que é feita fora do retângulo especificado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A> propriedade não será exibida.

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the `ToolTip.Popup` event.
trans-unit.target: Você pode aumentar os limites do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> antes de ser mostrada manipulando o `ToolTip.Popup` evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> class also provides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> methods to draw individual parts of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> in the standard way used by the operating system.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> classe também fornece o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> métodos para desenhar as partes individuais do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> da maneira padrão usado pelo sistema operacional.

trans-unit.source: You can use these methods, together with the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object methods, to make some parts of your ToolTip standard, while customizing other parts.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esses métodos, junto com o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> métodos para fazer algumas partes da dica de ferramenta padrão, ao personalizar a outras partes do objeto.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como desenhar personalizado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> and associates it to three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls located on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> e associa-o para três <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controles localizados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> property to true and handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> propriedade como true e identificadores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> eventos.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event handler, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is custom drawn differently depending on what button the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is being displayed for as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> manipulador de eventos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> é personalizada desenhada de maneira diferente dependendo de qual botão o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> está sendo exibido para conforme indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The code excerpt below demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> methods and using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Graphics%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O trecho de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBackground%2A> métodos e usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Graphics%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> class overview for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: Consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> visão geral da classe para o exemplo de código completo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> that is being drawn.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o texto para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> que está sendo desenhado.

trans-unit.source: The text that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> when the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw" /> event occurs.
trans-unit.target: O texto que está associado com o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip" /> quando o <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw" /> evento ocorre.

trans-unit.source: Typically you would use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A> property to determine what the ToolTip text is when you are custom drawing your ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você usaria o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A> propriedade para determinar o que é o texto de dica de ferramenta quando você está personalizado de dica de ferramenta de desenho.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to customize the drawing of the ToolTip text.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics.DrawString%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para personalizar o desenho do texto de dica de ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: If you want to have the ToolTip text drawn using the system specified style, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se você quiser que o texto de dica de ferramenta desenhado usando o sistema especificado de estilo, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawText%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The text value comes from the value passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class.
trans-unit.target: O valor de texto vem do valor passado para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.SetToolTip%2A> método o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> classe.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to custom draw the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como desenhar personalizado a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>.

trans-unit.source: The example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> and associates it to three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls located on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> e associa-o para três <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controles localizados no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.

trans-unit.source: The example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> property to true and handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo define o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A> propriedade como true e identificadores de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> eventos.

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> event handler, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is custom drawn differently depending on what button the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is being displayed for as indicated by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: No <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw> manipulador de eventos, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> é personalizada desenhada de maneira diferente dependendo de qual botão o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> está sendo exibido para conforme indicado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.AssociatedControl%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: The code excerpt below demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> method and using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Graphics%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: O trecho de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.DrawBorder%2A> método e usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Bounds%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.ToolTipText%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs.Graphics%2A> propriedades.
